NOTE National standards bodies can supplement this annex with one containing terminology used in the nation concerned. A.2 Facilitative method A facilitative method is one in which the parties receive assistance in reaching an agreement on the resolution of the dispute. In general, no particular outcome is recommended by the dispute resolver. No determination of an outcome is made. Facilitative methods can range from passive to active. The
